attributes.action: Hold a General Election before Brexit
attributes.additional_details: The UK voted AGAINST staying in the EU but it is unclear what people voted FOR. Holding a General Election before Brexit would let politicians plan HOW to exit the EU (or not) and the electorate to vote FOR their preferred plan in the early General Election.
attributes.background: This petition asks the House of Commons to vote on the motion “That there shall be an early parliamentary general election”, as per Section 2.1(a) of The Fixed-Term Parliaments Act 2011 BEFORE informing the European Council of Brexit under Lisbon Treaty Article 50.
